snippet: Congress seems frightened of the political fallout that would come from making much-needed cuts in the defense budget.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Congress for failing to make much-needed cuts to a defense budget that nation no longer needs or can afford; argues that House Armed Service Committee remains chained to parochial and business interests; holds that failure undermines the Pentagon's own agenda and will mean less money for newer weapons.
lead_paragraph: Congress seems frightened of the political fallout that would come from making much-needed cuts in the defense budget.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
